tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Disha is a fantastic doctor...to me she is just like an angel...
The way she treated my child is just commendable.  Dr Disha has brought back my daughter's smile and helped her to bloom...thank you so much..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i took my mom for rct. she has suggested the most apt treatment for her and she took care of my mom very well inspite of my mom being a difficult patient for her. unlike other practitioners , she provides a long term solution which is what i looked for instead of a short term temporary solution.  she is also highly qualified but she undertakes continuous learning unlike other doctors who stop learning and practice their profession based on past knowledge. Although she stays in kolkata, she is not laidback in improving herself and thats evident from her certifications from ivy universities. also her practice includes latest equipment which is absent in other clinics. and to top it all, she doesn't even charge high like a Mumbai or Delhi based clinic.
reply_text: Thank you so much !! I really appreciate the effort

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Very friendly. Explains all aspects of tooth hygiene. I would recommend the doctors at dentistry to my friends.

tags: None
Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: * *** ** * **** ******** the scheduled doctor ****** was not there. The person attended was her husband ******* *** ****. Then, they charged fir every step differently. The doctor was ready for root canal **** ***** **** *** ************* Later on, no bill provided for the charged amount. Only for visit and cleaning charged 2500/-. Later, for actual root canal 4500/- for a single tooth is pending. And further later he told to discuss about crown pricing. *** ******** ******* *** ** **** *** *** **** ***** *** *** ***** ** ******** **** ******* ******* ****** * **** **** *** **** ***** **** **** **** ******* ******** ****** *********
reply_text:
Thank you Mr Suraj for the feedback 
We always provide invoice for the patient bills.
These are our charges for the root canal treatment.
We never force our patients to pay we inform prior to treatment 
If it is suitable to them they get the treatment done.

tags: None
review:
VERY MUCH DEDICATED, CARERING & HOMELY ATMOSPHERE.
BOTH DR DISHA& DR ANKUR ARE VERY CORDIALL. ENTIRE TREAMENT IS DONE WITH UTMOST CARE AND CONFIDENCE.
I WONDER, IF WE HAVE SUCH A CORDIAL COUPLE DOCTOR IN KOLKATA.

WE, WISH BOTH OF THEM ALL THE VERY BEST IN THEIR LIVES AND GOD BE ALWAYS WITH THEM AND PROTECT THEM.

IN FACT IN THE BEGINNING WE WERE BIT SURPRISED TO NOTE THAT THEY COME ALL THE WAY TO KOLKATA FROM LUDHIANA, WHICH IS NEVER HEARD OFF. BUT AFTER HEARING FROM THEM, IT GAVE US LOT OF CONFIDENCE IN BOTH OF THEM.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an exceptional experience at Dentistree during my mom's Root Canal Treatment. Dr. Disha and Dr. Ankur are not only highly skilled but also incredibly kind. Their guidance throughout the process was solid, and they ensured my mom's comfort at every step. We left the clinic feeling extremely satisfied with the care received. Dentistree is undoubtedly the place to go for top-notch dental treatment with a personal touch. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Few recommendations 

- the water while cleaning/washing was being sprinkled all over the face. It would be great if that is avoided 
- it is suggested that you make the patient wear glasses so that they can keep their eyes open while being treated. Eyes can be injured if kept open without  the glasses.

I didn't had to take a single pain killer during the course of the treatment .

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very Terrible and too expensive and not worth ! Without informing  the patient They will charge extra and add the money in ur bill !
reply_text:
Dear patient you did not report at the scheduled time. At the time you have reported I was performing an emergency treatment and I have personally apologised to you for being late. It is important to understand that we are working on patients and It may take some extra time than scheduled. You have reported to the clinic with pain in the wisdom tooth. Whenever wisdom tooth is involved bilaterally it is important that a full mouth radiograph is taken to check the proper position. Incase you did not want to get it done then you should have  informed us. Also my staff made an extra effort to email you the image at the same time since you were travelling. Of course when a radiograph is taken you will have to pay for the same. Incase you do not want to pay then it is advised that you inform the doctor because as a dentist it is our duty to make complete diagnosis and then only prescribe medicines. Moreover we charge only 500 INR for the radiograph where as anywhere else it is charged no less than 700 INR. It is very shameful to see that you are accusing the dentist when the dentist is billing for genuine consultation charge which are clearly mentioned on Practo. Suppose you do not want to pay for radiograph please inform doctor we can waive it off but if you have taken the image by email you will have to pay for it. It is also shameful on part of Practo to accept such feedback without knowing that no treatment per se has been rendered to the patient and only consultation for performed for which the fee is clearly mentioned on Practo.
It is very sad to see that patient has so negative attitude if doctors request for genuine fee of 1000INR ( 500INR consultation plus 500INR radiograph)  which is with radiograph which is mandatory to prescribe medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
